author: Elizabeth Winkler
title: Netflix Hasn’t Found an Expectation It Can’t Beat
text:
Netflix keeps raising the bar. That is a risky game except, apparently, for Netflix.
The stock has surged 37% since January when Netflix reported fourth-quarter results that included a record-breaking 8.3 million new subscribers. Netflix predicted a strong first quarter with 6.35 million new subscribers; it added 7.41 million, a first-quarter record for the company.
